name: Cooking Love - Cooking Games
description:
Send you an interesting message!
Dear Chef, you are a lover of cooking games so much. And you always want to find a game of simulating restaurants to show off your cooking speed and skills. Join the madness fever of cooking, where you race against the clock to cook and serve your customers! The food city is always opened for you to write your own diary for cooking love.
Cooking Game Features:
- Own 5-star restaurants in many countries: United States, Japan Cuisines, India, China, Mexico and coming soon
- Cooking cultures from North America to South America, from Europe to Asia
- Discover 100+ unique recipes to make ton of delicious dishes
- Show your love with fast-paced cooking games by challenging 500+ frenzy levels
- Practice cooking in the magic kitchen by using powerful boosts
- Addictive gameplay and enjoy endless cooking and baking fun!

Come to the cooking adventure, as a passionate chef, you are invited to take part in those challenges. Now you have the opportunity to fulfill your dream of becoming a cooking star chef. Accept this challenge! Let’s start your own food fever in Cooking Love. This cooking game will simulate your crazy-cooking, time management and food serving skills!
What are FUN things to make more special for Cooking Love?
The LOVE for COOKING
- You love: Burger, Donuts, Pizza... or Seafood restaurants? 300+ yummy food meals awaiting for you to cook.
- Time-management for cooking is your main mission in this restaurant simulation games
- Unlock ingredients and upgrade your cooking kitchenwares
- Make more cooking combos like a Master Chef
- Use Booster items to power up your cooking skills.
The LOVE for SERVING
- Open more restaurants all around the world as you can
- Welcome and serve in time to keep the customers happy with your restaurant services.
- Claim coins & gems from customer’s tips money to develop your restaurant business.
- During rush hour, try to serve more customers and create more combos to earn more coins.
- Complete all your tasks in the box to cook up.
- Do not burn or waste any food!
No time to miss. Download now, join Cooking Love and play cooking games anytime, anywhere.
